attributes.title: I was TRUMPed by how bad this app was😔
attributes.review: So many bugs and glitches. Apps such as tik tok and instagram totally TRUMP this app. If you’re looking into political content to educate yourself pull the TRUMP card that is tik tok itself. (That is if it’s still around by next week or even tomorrow). But I’m sure we’ll still have a TRUMP card so it’s fine. This app did not TRUMP anything at all and was really hard to work around. The app was poorly formatted and was hard to navigate through. My cat ended up in the dishwasher. I guess my cat was TRUMPed not too sure.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS A TOTAL SCAM
attributes.review: As a dedicated Trump supporter who loves white supremacy and promoting racism in this great country, I was hoping to learn all about Trump’s campaign and how I can contribute to the garbage fire that is our country right now!❤️🧚🏾😘 But I was super disappointed when I opened the app and my phone got spammed with nude pictures of Trump and Melania. I have absolutely no problem with people’s preferences when it comes to the bedroom... even when it involves an unhealthy amount of spray tan, but I DID NOT WANT TO SEE THAT. My eyes are now bleeding, and I wish I had the money to sue for the damage this app has caused me.

attributes.title: Sucked
attributes.review: It put a virus in my phone and it was locked for days I’m pretty sure the app was spying on me or sum I DO NOT RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING THIS APP IT SUCKS✨

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP ITS DANGEROUS
attributes.review:

He is crazyyy. 
                          🚨IM WARNING U 🚨

attributes.title: This app is HORRIBLE 🥰🧚🏿‍♂️
attributes.review: I don’t know why anyone would see any interest in an app such as this. The name of the app “Trump 2020” doesn’t sound right, in fact it sounds wrong on SO many levels. 🏳️‍🌈 ✊🏿
